title: Failed to start quarkus Caused by: graphql.AssertException: Name must be non-null, non-empty and match [_A-Za-z][_0-9A-Za-z]* - was 'issue by request_id'
body:
### Describe the bug

Hi everybody,
I'm trying to run my application in DevMode, but I get a strange error when I implement the following graphql query method (in the resource class):
```
@Query("issue by request_id")
    @Description("Getting a specific issue")
    public Issue findById(@Name("request_id") Long request_id) {
        LOG.info("----- HERE IS CALLING TO GET A SPECIFIC ISSUE -----");

        return repository.findById(request_id);
    }
```

The error occurs when I disable comments for the method above.
Knowing that I started with the name "requestId" -> "requestid" -> until -> "request_id" but always the same result !

### Expected behavior

I guess that I should have something like this (this is what I get without that query / when I remove it):

![ask-05](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84474060/163488399-e3a413a2-be21-4f96-bc6f-d3aa3e091967.jpg)


In this condition I can receive feedback from the DB

![ask-06](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84474060/163488690-ea7bd691-20a6-4ade-a774-3799466da5cf.jpg)




### Actual behavior

This is the error that I get when I implement that query:

```
$ ./gradlew quarkusDev
```

### How to Reproduce?

This is the reproducer file:
[repro.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/8492529/repro.zip)


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Win 10

### Output of `java -version`

11 java version "11.0.13" 2021-10-19 LTS

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

_No response_

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 7.4

### Additional information

_No response_
